version_description:
1.Update for iPad Pro.
2.One new Demo Song "Alilang" (阿里郎).
3.Playback is smoother.

1. Support iOS 11.
2. Support landscape orientation.
3. Bug fixes.

1. Fixed bug of unexpected silence.
2.Fixed crash issue.

1. UI adjustment. Scrollbar has been removed. you can Drag / Pinch at Pitch Sliders for scrolling and zooming view.
2. improved Yaozhi sound effect.
3. Background color is changeable.
4. Display all transpose Buttons (if you turned on "Show transpose buttons" in Settings).
5. Backwards compatible to iOS 9.

1. New in Settings:：
(1).String color is changeable.
(2).String velocity curve is changeable.
(3).Position of green strings can follow by tune.(Always on pitch "5")
(4).String vibration animations can be turn off.
2.Fixed bug of recording on iOS9, iOS10.

1.Songs for learning Guzheng and follow-play.
2.Large size string label is optional.
3.Fixed volume bug.
4.New Help contents.
